nodes.bodyText: @dolbeew please take another look tomorrow. I'm not sure whether I'm fixing a testing idiosyncrasy or if this was a real issue
The sidebar is supposed to be open already here after clicking the link in the tree, so clicking the criteria icon shouldn't be necessary. Not sure why it's not working, taking a look locally now.

Ok, I see the issue now. If the sidebar is closed, it won't open when the
 icon is clicked now that the inactive sidebar content isn't rendered.
It's an easy fix, but I can't suggest changes to unchanged files. Okay if I push a commit?
Done. Also reverted the previous commit since the test should pass now.
